description: Talk to Casey to understand his struggle and offer empathy.

description: Post a public comment that challenges the hazing norms and encourages Casey with situational context: Casey joined last month, was forced into extra push‑ups by seniors after practice, feels anxious and fears being labeled a snitch, and needs someone to make it clear that this isn’t okay.
label: Challenge hazing norms publicly.
